name: Blood Week
description:
You are William, a young lumberjack who lives with his mother and grandmother in Kote, a historically well-off logging village, that has been dying over the past 30 years.
Not content to live in the mud, chopping rotting trees down forever, he often explores the forest, but one day he stumbles across something that will set him upon a dark path, leading him to an unholy revelation about Blood Week, a calamitous event that shook the world all those years ago...

This is the Demo/Prologue version of the game I will be making, called Blood Week.
In the future, I will be rebuilding this game from the ground up when I have gained more skills and assets.

Nonetheless, I sincerely hope that you enjoy the prologue, and if you have any feedback, good or bad, please join the games Discord server @ https://discord.gg/c8QZ8fJtFf
